summary: "The world's greatest city laid bare!", roars the tagline to LONDON IN THE RAW (1964), a salacious documentary that tours the strip-clubs and underground dives of the still-swinging city.
keywords: england|united kingdom|cold war era|full frontal female nudity|strip show
director: Directors: Arnold L. Miller (as Arnold Louis Miller), Norman Cohen (uncredited)
title: London in the Raw
